title: Diamond Maang Tikka Pendant - Dazzling Elegance for the Modern Bride
features: Contemporary geometric design with alternating square and diamond shaped settings. Each diamond is meticulously placed to maximize brilliance and fire. Can be used as a Maang Tikka pendant or a modern short necklace pendant. Secured with sturdy loops for easy attachment to chains or tikka hooks.
description: This pendant blends traditional aesthetics with a modern design, crafted with exceptional diamond quality and gold purity. Its versatile nature allows it to be worn as a tikka pendant or as a stylish necklace pendant. A perfect blend of tradition and contemporary elegance, making it a treasured addition to your collection.
